outboundReferences.contextLine: Here is a checklist of milestones for developing and testing model architectures: if we don't do well in one step, probably a good idea to go back one.  This more or less pertains to the *model* part of the [[ml-ops]] lifecycle.

inboundReferences.contextLine: A checklist for what kind of things to look out for when diagnosing models, related to [[training-notes]].
